title: In game screen is missing top, bottom, left, and right side of screen. HELP.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Ok so this happened over the last update. Everything else on my computer is fin but when I go to play league I cant see the top of my screen (so the kills/timers) or my mana bar or the right side of the map etc, i tried every resolution and nothing works and tried to edit the res in the config files but nothing worked. Please help, it's extremely annoying to play with a bunch of my screen missing.

Ok for some reason my map is fine now but the top and left side is still messed up.

replies.body: Are you on a 4K or exceeding 1920x1080?  Those settings can cause issues like this, so reducing your resolution should help if it's the case for you.  In addition to resteting your config as you've already done, what happens if you toggle your game to Fullscreen?  Let me know.

I'm actually using a tv as a monitor but it fit fine up until a few days ago. My res is 1768 x 992. I normally play in fullscreen but when I do now my mana bar, chat, map, and kills/timers are cut off. BUT when I screenshot it for you, you can see my mana bar and everything? It only shows up in screenshots..

Your config settings may be acting up.  Try performing a reset to see if it helps.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know how that works for you.

Now my league will load in as windowed and its very small and when i get in game its also a very small window but everything is fitting properly, now if i try to go back to fullscreen it messes up again. Although its technically 'fine' its way too small to play on. 
https://gyazo.com/8e95145dc702e8e23108cae7a2d668aa do I need to delete any of these?

Thanks for the info.  It sounds like you were able to reset your config if those changes occurred, though not really optimal.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this.  In the meantime, you may need to try another monitor to restore your game screen to normal.  We'll reply back asap!

Thanks, I've already made a ticket and got a couple responses but now nothing.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/25564112
I also don't have another monitor sadly..
Well in that image we can see the timer and stuff and I don't really see anything missing on the left...
You can't see baron timer, and on the left you cant really tell but the chat is half off the screen
